snippet: The releases are expected to help bolster efforts by Afghanistan’s High Peace Council to start talks with the insurgents.
abstract: Many of at least a dozen Afghan Taliban prisoners being released by Pakistan are significant figures, and Afghan peace representatives are exultant as they announce that more releases may follow; releases are expected to help bolster peace efforts in Afghanistan.

byline.contributor: Sharifullah Sahak and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul, and Declan Walsh from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The releases are expected to help bolster efforts by Afghanistan’s High Peace Council to start talks with the insurgents.

headline.seo: Pakistan May Release More Taliban Prisoners
headline.main: More Taliban Prisoners May Be Released
headline.print_headline: More Taliban Prisoners May Be Released
